title: Pornografia 2003 DVDRip Sonata Premiere
description:
Set in 1943, World War II provides a vivid backdrop for the action of Jan Jakub Kolski's wonderfully lyrical Pornografia. The story concerns a game that two adult men, theater director Fryderyk (Krzysztof Majchrzak) and writer Witold (Adam Ferency), play to convince a sixteen-year-old girl and boy to fall in love. The girl, Henia, is the youthful, unsuspecting daughter of their hosts, the loquacious Hipolit (Krzysztof Globisz) and drunken Marysia (GraÃ…Âºyna BÃ…â€šÃ„â„¢cka-Kolska), who have invited the men to wait out the war on their farm. Quiet and perfunctory, the boy, Karol, is unaware of their schemes, and Henia's proud, solidly mustached fiancÃƒÂ© also fails to catch on, with tragic consequences. The story's irony Ã¢â‚¬â€ the men's insistence on winning this private, "pornographic" war to build sexual attraction between the teenagers and their absolute disinterest in the real one that wages around them Ã¢â‚¬â€ is conveyed through imaginative camerawork, an unforgettable, "sad-happy" soundtrack, and superb acting. Majchrzak and Globisz, in particular, give worthy performances as goofy but unyielding personalities.
